version_description:
- iOS 7 Bugfixes
- Stability improvements

*****

PDF Pro 2 is available on the App Store! Rewritten from scratch and optimized for iOS 7 with a beautiful new UI, improved performance and a lot of new features!
Get it now!

- iOS 7 Bugfixes
- Stability improvements

*****

PDF Pro 2 is available on the App Store! Rewritten from scratch and optimized for iOS 7 with a beautiful new UI, improved performance and a lot of new features!
Get it now!

- iOS 7 display issues has been fixed.

Get it now!

- Miscellaneous bugfixes

PDF Reader goes Pro and becomes PDF Pro 3!

Our biggest release so far, with hundreds of new features. PDF Pro 3 lets you read, edit, annotate, and share your PDF documents on iPhone and iPad.

For more information visit: http://pdf-pro.net

PDF Reader goes Pro and becomes PDF Pro 3!

For more information visit: http://pdf-pro.net

3.2.2:
- Cache size is now displayed correctly after clearing the cache.
- An issue regarding the download of documents via HTTP has been fixed.
- Support for external keyboards has been improved.

3.3:
ADDED:
- Sorting is now also available on iPhone
- New sorting features like: "Files after Folders", "Folders after Files" and "By Title Color"
- Insert pages from one document in to another document
- Option to disable True Ink handwr

3.3:
ADDED:
- Sorting is now also available on iPhone
- New sorting features like: "Files after Folders", "Folders after Files" and "By Title Color"
- Insert pages from one document in to another document
- Option to disable True Ink handwr

3.4:
ADDED:
- Added native Apple Pencil support
- Added 3D touch support for previewing pages in thumbnail gallery

IMPROVED:
- Improved Adonit stylus support
- Improved Wacom stylus support
- The Wi-Fi interface has been rewritten

3.4:
ADDED:
- Added native Apple Pencil support
- Added 3D touch support for previewing pages in thumbnail gallery

IMPROVED:
- Improved Adonit stylus support
- Improved Wacom stylus support
- The Wi-Fi interface has been rewritten

3.4.1:
IMPROVED:
- iOS 10.3 support

FIXED:
- iOS 10.3 introduced a new file system. This caused some problems with file transfer via iTunes. These issues have been fixed.

3.5:
ADDED:
- We added a user guide with tutorials and several help topics. This is a work in progress and we will continuously add articles on a regular basis. The user guide is also available online.
Check it out: http://help.pdf-pro.net

3.5:
ADDED:
- We added a user guide with tutorials and several help topics. This is a work in progress and we will continuously add articles on a regular basis. The user guide is also available online.
Check it out: http://help.pdf-pro.net

3.6:
ADDED:
- We added Microsoft OneDrive.
- Adobe root CA is now used, so that documents can be more easily verified the same way as on desktop readers.
- We added support for more types of certificates in Digital Signatures.
- Signature a

3.6:
ADDED:
- We added Microsoft OneDrive.
- Adobe root CA is now used, so that documents can be more easily verified the same way as on desktop readers.
- We added support for more types of certificates in Digital Signatures.
- Signature a

3.6.1:
IMPROVED:
- Drawing and erasing with Apple Pencil has been improved.

FIXED:
- We fixed a problem where documents protected with an owner-password sometimes ended up locked after saving.
- Interaction with read-only link annotatio

3.6.1:
IMPROVED:

FIXED:

3.7:
NEW:
- All new iOS 11 Support and Design.
- Complete iPhone X Support.
- Split view a.k.a multitasking on iPad.
- Drag & Drop files, images and text between different apps on iPad.
- You can now send multiple files via E-Mail or

3.7:
NEW:

- Complete iPhone X Support.
- Split view a.k.a multitasking on iPad.
- Drag & Drop files, images and text between different apps on iPad.
- You can now send multiple files via E-Mail or

IMPROVED:
- Text selection has been improved.

FIXED:

- Undo and redo works now as intended.
- Page labels now always display the correct page number after device rotation.

3.8:
NEW:
- Option to enable Automatic Sleep Mode, which turns the screen off when inactive.

- Annotation performance has been improved.

NEW:
- You can now cut and paste pages when editing a document.
- You can now set permissions and protect PDFs with passwords.
- We added a document info view to the outline and annotation list.

NEW:

- You can now set permissions and protect PDFs with passwords.
- We added a document info view to the outline and annotation list.

3.10:
NEW:
- Support for the new Apple Pencil.
- All new Magic Ink Tool: Automatically converts drawings into shapes.
- You can now set several document permissions and protect your PDFs with passwords.
- Adds support for the "CMD+W" keyboa

3.10:

- Improves the performance of documents with JavaScript interactivity.

3.12.1:

ADDED:
- You can now create new documents.
- You can now import and open documents stored in the system Files app.

REMOVED:
- In order to concentrate our efforts on the upcoming iOS 13 release, we dropped iOS 10 Support.

3.12.1:

ADDED:
- All new floating page selector.
- All new annotation inspector.
- You can now rotate text annotations.
- You can now customize the eraser thickness.

IMPROVED:
- Improves loading performance for complex documents

3.13:

- You can now customize the eraser thickness.

IMPROVED:

- Cut or copy pages and paste them into other applications is now supported.

- iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max support.
